channel.title: Help with dieing
channel.description: Well i want it so you only lose stuff in the wild but when you die out of the wild you keep it :P

item.title: Help with dieing
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Go to your death method, and find the method which drops your items. I think its dropAllItems() or uhh youdied()

And replace it with this:

if(Wild()) { youdied(); }

You might also need this:

public boolean Wild() { return absX >= 2949 && absX <= 3400 && absY >= 3521 && absY <= 4462; }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with dieing
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

relmitos:

Nobody is going to stick his/her time in you if you don’t try it yourself first.

Exactly.

aplwanabes:

wow? sad people… im not looking through like 5k posts to find someone who asked this question… and also its not in tuts so… just help me dickheads you only posted because you dont no how to even code at all…

Pathetic. Why resort to flame? You were only told to attempt it yourself. There probably isn’t a tutorial for this, because it’s too easy. All you need is a boolean checking if the player is in the wilderness. A few lines of code. Nothing more. Yet you ask without trying then flame when you’re told to try it yourself?

And I can guarantee everyone who’s replied to this topic knows more about coding than you currently do. This is pure proof. It gives the impression you have no idea what you’re doing.

Of course, I WOULD provide an example of code if not the whole thing, had you been more polite, less fag-like and had actually tried it.

aplwanabes:

spoonfed is retarded this is the “help” section for a reason

The point in the help section is to “help”, not “give”.

Read full topic

wow? sad people… im not looking through like 5k posts to find someone who asked this question… and also its not in tuts so… just help me dickheads you only posted because you dont no how to even code at all…

item.title: Help with dieing
item.dc:creator: @iKapa iKapa
item.description:
@iKapa wrote:

King Lingerz:

[quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=267609.msg2209545#msg2209545 date=1209815119]you’ll have to show us what you’ve already done. THIS IS A MUST! If we want to get anywhere as a community, we’re going to have to quit the spoon-feeding. So if you ask something like “how do I get food healing to work” and show us no previous attempts, you’re not going to get an answer. You may be wondering how a question like this is considered bad. Well, the question asker did not make an attempt to solve the problem him or herself, and is indirectly asking the same question as “tell me how to get food healing work so I can continue my effortless server.” So, remember, show us what you’ve done, what you’ve tried to do, or what you think may work.

… We’re waiting.[/quote]

Agreed.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with dieing
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

For unlocked topics please learn how to ask a question![Updated 9/28/08]

you’ll have to show us what you’ve already done. THIS IS A MUST! If we want to get anywhere as a community, we’re going to have to quit the spoon-feeding. So if you ask something like “how do I get food healing to work” and show us no previous attempts, you’re not going to get an answer. You may be wondering how a question like this is considered bad. Well, the question asker did not make an attempt to solve the problem him or herself, and is indirectly asking the same question as “tell me how to get food healing work so I can continue my effortless server.” So, remember, show us what you’ve done, what you’ve tried to do, or what you think may work.

… We’re waiting.

Read full topic
